name: Joe Hat
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: A fun token created by Trader Joe team that allows 1 HAT to be redeemed for a real physical hat. Only 150 hats in existence and each HAT is burned when redeemed.
